abstract: Some current and former members of the Fed’s Consumer Advisory Council say a watchdog agency doesn’t belong in there.
snippet: Some current and former members of the Fed’s Consumer Advisory Council say a watchdog agency doesn’t belong in there.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — As the Senate contemplates creation of a consumer financial protection agency within the Federal Reserve, opposition to the idea has emerged from an unexpected quarter: the Fed’s Consumer Advisory Council.

headline.main: Its Own Advisers Oppose Consumer Role for the Fed
headline.print_headline: Its Own Advisers Oppose Consumer Role for the Fed
